name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Havoc
name_original: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Havoc
description:
Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Havoc is an action-shooter game developed by Sledgehammer Games. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Havoc on PC and PlayStation 3.
